Lynch]]<br>Barry Gurstein<br>David Pitlik<br><small>(based on characters created by [[Gordon Korman]])</small> | starring = [[Michael Galeota]]<br>[[Courtnee Draper]]<br>[[Jermaine Williams]]<br>[[Brianne Prather]]<br>[[Cheselka Leigh]]<br>[[Theo Greenly]]<br>[[Anna Newman]]<br>[[Meagan Good]] | country = United States | audio_format = | picture_format = [[480i]] ([[SDTV]]) | language = English | network = [[Disney Channel]] | opentheme = | first_aired = {{Start date|1999|1|30}}<!-- As per parameter description for this infobox, first aired means "The first day the show aired", not Disney marketing's version of "series premiere" --> | last_aired = {{End date|2004|3|23}} | num_seasons = 3 | num_episodes = 65 | list_episodes = List of The Jersey Episodes | website = }} '''''The Jersey''''' is a [[television series]] that aired on [[Disney Channel]] that premiered January 30, 1999, and based on the ''[[Monday Night Football Club]]'' books by [[Gordon Korman]]. The finale was on March 23, 2004. ==Premise== ''The Jersey'' is about Nick Lighter, Morgan Hudson, Coleman Galloway, and Elliot Riffkin, four teens who discover the magic of "the jersey", a mystical football jersey that transports them into the bodies of professional athletes. This is done in a way similar to the way that the main character in ''[[Quantum Leap (TV series)|Quantum Leap]]'', ''Sam'', travels from body to body, and there is a different athlete featured in every episode. The show has several sports superstars as guest [[actor]]s, including [[Dan Lyle]], [[Michael Andretti]], [[Terrell Davis]], [[David Robinson (basketball)|David Robinson]], [[Malik Rose]], [[Tony Gonzalez (tight end)|Tony Gonzalez]], [[Shannon Sharpe]], [[Donovan McNabb]], [[Byron Dafoe]], [[Michael Strahan]], [[Kurt Warner]], [[Stephon Marbury]], [[Sergei Fedorov]], [[Kordell Stewart]], [[Jerome Bettis]], [[Junior Seau]], [[Scott Steiner]], [[Eddie George]], [[Sabrina Bryan]], [[Randy Johnson]], [[Tony Hawk]], [[Laila Ali]], [[Peyton Manning]], and [[Danny Farmer]]. ==Cast== * [[Michael Galeota]] as Nick Lighter * [[Courtnee Draper]] as Morgan Hudson * [[Jermaine Williams]] as Coleman Galloway * [[Brianne Prather]] as Hilary Lighter * [[Cheselka Leigh]] as Willa Conklin * [[Theo Greenly]] as Elliot Rifkin * [[Michael Bofshever]] as Mr. Lighter * [[Anna Newman]] as Mrs. Lighter * [[Meagan Good]] as Tamika * [[Vance Yudell]] as Phill Parker ==Production== While production on the show wrapped in February 2001, new episodes were shown until 2004. The last few episodes aired early Saturday mornings on Disney and after 64 episodes were shown, ''The Jersey'' was completely taken off the air in June 2004. ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links == * {{IMDb title|0211816}} * {{tv.com show|the-jersey|The Jersey}} {{Disney Channel Original Series}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Jersey, The}} [[Category:1999 American television series debuts]] [[Category:2004 American television series endings]] [[Category:1990s American television series]] [[Category:2000s American television series]] [[Category:American children's comedy series]] [[Category:American sports television series]] [[Category:Disney Channel shows]] [[Category:English-language television programming]] [[Category:Teen sitcoms]] [[Category:Television series by Disney]]
